dataList.dlg:
- Guys, let's think this through. So—
- Ah! I think we might have some enemies coming our way, maybe?
- S.U. Incoming.

- If you have any difficult cases, just let us know and we'll help you out~
- Every mystery has a clue to solve it, after all!

- The heck? What just happened?
- Wow, looks like something really bad happened to everyone in that little blink of an eye.
- A fat cat with a lot of time did it. Maybe.

- W.A.H.
- Weak as hell, sure, sure... But can we try to get to the bottom of this issue first? Like, let's see what exactly caused this to happen.
- Because they're W.A.H. What else?
- Gosh...

- Ah! I wonder if someone's taken their time?
- Can'tcha see? Someone kicked their butt hard, that's what happened~

- How strange... That attack didn't seem like it should've hurt that much.
- Might be an attack from an unseen menace.
- Guys, not the time! We've got a problem on our hands.

- Nice, ya sure took care of that enemy!
- We're now a step closer to the truth, wouldn't you say?

- Another one bites the dust.
- Nooo... We won't have enough people to solve the case at this rate...
- Hmm~ I think the remaining people should do just fine? We're in the clear. For now, at least~

- Do we even have any hope left?
- The case was broken from its foundations. Topple the whole thing and start again from the fundamentals.
- Yeah. Maybe finding a different way forward is the answer here.

- What do you think about their chances, Ryōshū?
- F.F. Not bad.
- They've had some trouble, but I'm sure they can see this thing through!

- Given the circumstances, solving this problem seems impossible, but... we've been fighting and beating the impossible this whole time, right?
- Then I believe we will win, despite the belief that we won't.
- Both of you have such cool attitudes~

- ... I lit a cigarette.
- Huh? Wha?
- This is the pivotal moment. A single choice will determine how this story ends. Puff... a perfect moment to burn a quality cig.

- That... looks dangerous!
- No foreshadowing. Too sudden.
- Hmm~ Wouldn't it be nice if every problem were foreshadowed just like in detective novels?

- ... Yo! I know this. Usually, in these kinds of stories, unless the protagonist does everything just right... everyone dies!
- Heh. Gimmicky.
- Then there has to be a clue hiding somewhere, right?

- Obvious weakness. What a flat character.
- Aw, that's simply too elementary, wasn't it? Makes for a boring case.

- Wait, wha...? That wasn't it?
- That was like trying to shove a pentagon key into a triangular keyhole~
- Hm. Any key can become a skeleton key as long as there is sufficient strength behind it.

- Ahh~ I totally coulda deduced that myself... that mystery was right up my alley. Too bad ya solved it already!
- That was pretty easy to miss unless you were paying attention. How smart~

- This is your 'deduction' despite collecting all those clues? Mediocre.
- Why don't you share your take then, huh? Ryōshū.
- Hmph, no. I don't do spoilers.

- Things aren't looking good all of a sudden...
- Maybe they triggered a secret device.

- They've slowed down a bunch, just as we expected.
- Hmph, time to slaughter them.
- Can we stick to the detective lingo and call it 'close the case', Ryōshū...? C'mon, you've got the look down, with a cool pipe and everything.

- You're all looking pretty busy! A new revelation, maybe?
- Well, finding a major clue does put a pep in your step~

- Case failed.
- Haah... did we do something wrong?
- Isn't this what you wanted, Ryōshū? You said earlier, stroking your mustache—'Obvious solutions are M.E.H.'
- 'Mediocre, Essentially Hackneyed'... did I get that right?

- Ladies and gentlemen, I believe the evidence speaks for itself... Thus, therein lies the answer! Break that part wide open!
- Ooh~ I read the same line from the book I borrowed last time! What a wonderful reenactment!

- Vain, rotten facsimiles of 'art' are often founded on shaky ground.
- Aha, so breaking one part will eventually bring the whole thing down. That's what you're saying, right?
- Puff. Correct.

- Ahhh?! A-are you okay?
- The wound looks too serious...
- Hope the evidence isn't broken.

- Oh, that is way worse than we expected... Maybe our approach was wrong?
- No, it's not we who are wrong. It's the situation that's wrong about us.
- ... What are you talking about? We clearly got something wrong! Which explains that huge wound!

- Heck yeah~ That's the crux of this whole case!
- At this rate, we'll be solving this case in no time~ They won't be able to refute this evidence.

- Stay alert. The case isn't over.
- Aren't we making some pretty good progress, though?
- Yeah, nothing wrong with getting a lil' excited~

- ... And then there were none. - But there are some? - Heh... that's why it's and then there were none. - Well~ I think we'll get to the point of there being none in no time as long as we keep this up!
- Woo! Now that's case closed! - Predictable battle. P.F. No, worse than pulps. - Fuhu, everyone did great work today~

- What a T.A.B.
- Ugh... nah, it wasn't a turnabout. I had a feeling it was going to end badly.
- Huh? Oh, I don't think she meant 'turnabout.'
- I meant to say 'What a Thrashing and Bashing'.

- We're not here just to deduce mysteries!
- We're here to watch this battle, and~
- W.A.T.C.H.
- No! We're analyzing the case honestly! Come on, Ryōshū, we agreed to do away with acronyms today~
